name: NSScriptExecutionContext
desc: The context in which the current script command is executed.

items.name: var topLevelObject: Any?
items.desc: Sets the top-level object for an object-specifier evaluation.

items.name: var objectBeingTested: Any?
items.desc: Sets the top-level container object currently being tested in a “whose” qualifier to a given object.

items.name: var rangeContainerObject: Any?
items.desc: Sets the top-level container object for a range-specifier evaluation to a give object.
